div.h4: Vega ISD Distance Learning Resource Page

div.class: col-md-6 col-xs-6 img-responsive wow animated wow animated pulse
col-md-6 col-xs-6 img-responsive wow animated wow animated pulse
img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated pulse
custom_147268 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: Good afternoon from Vega ISD, it was so good to see some of our students this morning and we miss each and everyone one of you. I know we all got choked up at times throughout the whole trip.

Governor Abbott had a news conference this afternoon and has ordered schools to continue distance learning until May 4th. I know this is an inconvenience to everyone (students, teachers and parents) and we all want to get back to school. Hang in there and I’m talking to everybody. If you’re having issues, communicate with your teachers and principals. We have been at it for four/five days and we will continue to monitor our progress and make adjustments as needed.
Vega ISD will persevere throughout this crisis!!
It’s a great day to be a Longhorn!!!

div.p: Mission: Through vision and commitment, Vega ISD creates a challenging learning environment that encourages high expectations for life long success. We strive to have our parents, teachers, and community members actively involved in and supportive of our students' learning.
Vision: Academic Excellence for All Students--School-Wide Accountability---Always Raising the Bar
